name: Carrier Commander
description:
As a career Naval Commander, you are specifically chosen to defend any Aircraft Carrier's in distress. Your orders are to protect the Navy's most valuable ship in the fleet until assistance arrives to perform necessary repairs to the vessel.

You will be in charge of all operations of the Carrier's Defense while the repairs are being performed:

> Purchase - Configure - then Launch your F16 Fighters into the skies to battle against incoming Enemy Aircraft.

> Upgrade your AA Defense Turrets on the Carrier to fire multiple shots or increase the speed of reloading speed to improve your defenses.

> Launch Sonar or Radar Aircraft to keep an eye on enemy advancements towards your Carrier.

> Arm your Destroyer Escorts with various defenses and deploy them to engage incoming fleets, aircraft or submarines.

> Manage Fuel used by the aircraft you deploy to ensure your don't run out of Fuel Reserves on the Carrier.

> Deploy Decoy Planes onto your Flight Deck to defend against incoming projectiles.
